name: INTERACT
description:
Hi all,

first of all, be aware that this game was not made with pico-8.

This little game will have taken me seven hours of work and it is "allalonegamez" which has come up with the concept. Me, I did the rest. You must recover the spatio-temporal ball by modifying the space which surrounds you. the directional arrows to move, the z key to modify the space, press the space key to jump, use the mouse to select the object and finally use the r key to restart the level.

I also wanted to say that I made the cover image and the graphics myself, HIHIHI

Do not hesitate to leave a comment !!

Thank you.
